q1: Mexico play a great brand of football, they just need more consistency.
a1: I agree. I think the coach is the problem.
q2: What coach would you like to see leading Mexico?
a2: They should get a successful coach such as La Volpe.
q3: There is a reason La Volpe left the team the first time.
q5: How will the coach do better?
a5: Mexico coach will utilize the support staff
a6: He may get fired, he may not, who's to say. Anyway, it was good talking to you!
